title: 'Demoralized' Russian Prisoner Paul Whelan Pleads With Biden to Do More to Free Him - The Messenger
text: [Texas Teen Says He Shot 2 Friends in the Head Because He Always Wanted to Kill: Police](/news/texas-teen-says-he-shot-2-friends-in-the-head-because-he-always-wanted-to-kill-police?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=trending_story) ‘Demoralized’ Russian Prisoner Paul Whelan Pleads With Biden to Do More to Free Him 'I feel alone. I feel betrayed,' said increasingly demoralized Marine veteran in a phone call from his prison [Mariana Labbate](/author/mariana-labbate) U.S. Marine veteran Paul Whelan has taken to the phone from the Russian penal colony where he has been held for five years to press President Joe Biden to secure his release. He spoke via phone on CNN Thursday to urge the president to use all resources available to bring him back to the U.S. "President Biden, please use every resource available to secure my release, as you would do if your own son was taken hostage," said Whelan. "I feel alone. I feel left behind," added Whelan, who noted he has watched American basketball star Brittney Griner and former U.S. Marine Trevor Reed freed amid negotiations as he waited. Whelan is being held on espionage charges, which both he and the Biden administration refute. Whelan noted cases like this, "foreigners are often used as pawns in diplomatic conflicts." [Russian Prisoner Paul Whelan Calls on Biden to Do More to Secure Release: ‘I’m Still Here’](/politics/paul-whelan-russia-prisoner-biden?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [First Video of American Paul Whelan in 3 Years Shows Him in Russian Prison Garb](/news/first-video-of-american-paul-whelan-in-3-years-shows-him-in-russian-prison-garb?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [American Marine Veteran Paul Whelan Attacked by Fellow Prisoner in Russian Labor Camp](/news/paul-whelan-attacked-prison-camp-russia-wrongfully-detained?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Paul Whelan Despairs, Says Biden Has ‘Left Me Behind’ in Russian Prison With No Heat, ‘Black Mold’](/news/paul-whelan-bbc-interview-russian-prison-prisoner-exchange?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Imprisoned American Paul Whelan Told Blinken Being Left Out of Russian Prisoner Swap Was Basically a ‘Death Warrant’](/politics/imprisoned-american-paul-whelan-told-blinken-being-left-out-of-russian-prisoner-swap-was-basically-a-death-warrant?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Whelan Called CNN From Russian Prison to Urge Release](/politics/whelan-called-cnn-from-russian-prison-to-urge-release?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) "The time is now to take decisive action, to bring the debacle to a close," Whelan continued. The veteran had already [called on Biden via phone earlier this week ](https://themessenger.com/politics/paul-whelan-russia-prisoner-biden)on Christmas eve. "You promised to bring me home. I’m still here," he told the president. Earlier in December, Whelan also accused the Biden administration of " [serious betrayal,](https://themessenger.com/news/paul-whelan-bbc-interview-russian-prison-prisoner-exchange)" saying it was "unfathomable to me that they've left me behind." Earlier this month, Russian President Vladimir Putin said Moscow has been speaking with U.S. officials about Whelan and imprisoned [Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich](https://themessenger.com/news/russian-court-extends-detention-of-wall-street-journal-reporter-gershkovich-until-end-of-january). Whelan's twin brother, David Whelan, told [National Public Radio](https://www.wbur.org/hereandnow/2023/12/28/paul-whelan-russia-detention) on Thursday that he is increasingly worried about the former Marine, who has grown seriously demoralized this past year, particularly following an attack by a fellow prisoner. He was unsure if Russian authorities have allowed him to use prison phones to call out, or if he may have obtained an "illicit" or "unauthorized" phone to make his urgent new pleas for freedom.
